name: Steel Storm: Burning Retribution

files.game: N/A:Please select the *.tar.gz installer downloaded from https://www.humblebundle.com

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the *.tar.gz installer downloaded from https://www.humblebundle.com
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    format: tgz
    src: $game
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/sh

      if (uname -m | grep "64"); then

      arch="64";

      else

      arch="";

      fi;

      ./steelstorm$arch

      '
    file: $GAMEDIR/start.sh
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/start.sh
